description:
Midori includes a number of helpers for common functionality needed during builds, including:
        * Sql - Create dbs with SMO, execute SQL scripts. Ship MDBs as part of a build, or run intgration tests against a fresh DB.
        * HipChat - send notifications
        * PsGet - Install PsGet and gain access to libraries such as PsCx
        * WinRM - Run code on remote servers, by exporting local PSM1 modules to remote machines
        * Jenkins - Download assets stored in S3
        * XUnit - Runs xunit tests and merges nunit output files for build servers, can create standalone xunit project files
        * Misc helpers - Safer transcription, better error logging, and other common usage helpers
releaseNotes: * 0.2.0.0 includes support for XUnit project creation and test execution!
summary:
Psake build tool helpers, with basic support for Jenkins build
        server, SQL database creation and script-running, HipChat notifications,
        PsGet integration PsGet, WinRM helpers and a number of misc PS tasks.
title: Midori - Sweeter Psake builds
